meta.name: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days
meta.description: On the heels of the success of 90 Day Fiancé and spinoff series 90 Day Fiancé: Happily Ever After?, comes a second spinoff series 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days. The newest linear addition to the franchise will follow couples who have an existing relationship online, but have not met in person. Viewers will experience their journey as they travel to the other's foreign country for the first time in an attempt to establish a relationship. At the end of the trip, the couple faces a choice: do they continue down a path towards a proposal and engagement to then begin the K-1 visa process, or will one of them be heading home with a broken heart?

videos.title: It's Going To Be A Bumpy Ride
It's Going To Be A Bumpy Ride
It's Going To Be A Bumpy Ride
It's Going To Be A Bumpy Ride
It's Going To Be A Bumpy Ride

Bon Voyage!
videos.overview: Three Americans who feel they've met their potential soul mates online prepare to travel internationally to meet them in person for the first time.

videos.title: Going the Distance
videos.overview: Sean lands in Haiti to potentially meet his love, Abby; Paul embarks on a two-day boat trip down the Amazon hoping that Karine will actually show up; Darcey encounters airport mishaps in Amsterdam.

videos.title: Language of Love
videos.overview: Darcey and Jesse spend their first day together in Amsterdam; Paul and Karine attempt to overcome their language barrier; Cortney prepares to meet a Spanish model that she's only ever texted; Sean tries to put his doubts aside with Abby.

videos.title: Meet the Parents
videos.overview: Paul struggles to communicate with Karine's family; dinner with Jesse's parents takes an unexpected turn for Darcey; Cortney leaves for Spain hoping she isn't being catfished; Patrick tells his family about traveling to Paris to meet Myriam.

videos.title: Secrets and Lies
videos.overview: Patrick leaves for Paris, while Myriam frets over a secret she has been keeping. Paul & Karine's happiness is interrupted by distrust. Sean faces tough questions from Abby's parents and Larry worries his Filipino girlfriend may not be faithful.

videos.title: Decisions, Decisions
videos.overview: Larry fails to get a hold of Jenny during his journey to the Philippines. Cortney hopes Antonio shows up at the airport. Darcey and Jesse struggle to defend their age gap to a skeptical friend. Sean makes a shocking new discovery about Abby's ex.

videos.title: Baby I'm Worth It
videos.overview: Myriam drops a bombshell on Patrick; Cortney feels neglected during her first day in Spain; Paul worries about the results of Karine's STD and pregnancy tests; Larry encounters travel mishaps on his way to the Philippines.

videos.title: Moment of Truth
videos.overview: A disagreement escalates between Darcey and Jesse; Larry has questions about Jenny's past during his first day in Manila; Patrick has a big decision to make in Paris after Myriam drops a bombshell; Abby's ex-boyfriend Chris arrives in Haiti.

videos.title: Red Flags
videos.overview: Sean finally meets Abby's ex-boyfriend in an emotional showdown; Jesse and Darcey reach a breaking point; Cortney is suspicious about Antonio's womanizing ways; Paul reveals a big secret to Karine, leading to a dangerous encounter in Brazil.

videos.title: Reality Check
videos.overview: Karine wonders what happened to Paul... Larry insults Jenny's family when he visits. Sean questions his future with Abby after their blow-up. Cortney wants more insight on Antonio's feelings. Patrick and Myriam have a heart to heart in Paris.

videos.title: On the Brink
videos.overview: Will Karine accept Paul's apology? Patrick pushes Myriam too far. Sparks fly between Cortney & Antonio. Sean goes in search of Abby after their fight. Jesse has a surprise for Darcey. Larry tries to make amends with Jenny after insulting her family.

videos.title: Line in the Sand
videos.overview: Tensions rise as Larry's cousin confronts Jenny; Patrick makes a last-ditch effort to win over Myriam; Sean returns to Ohio uncertain about his future with Abby; Cortney worries about leaving Antonio in Spain; Paul makes a grand gesture for Karine.

videos.title: All or Nothing
videos.overview: Karine has a big decision ahead of her; Larry has an important question for Jenny; Cortney worries about the future as she leaves Spain; Darcey and Jesse share an emotional good-bye; Sean returns to Haiti to see if Abby has kept her promise.

videos.title: Tell All
videos.overview: The couples reunite for an emotional and riveting tell all special. Now that everyone is back to long distance, they face new pressures, tension, and challenges. Host Shaun Robinson gets to the bottom of where they stand now.

videos.title: And So It Begins
videos.overview: Single mom Rachel prepares to travel to England with a baby; grandmother Angela gets ready to meet her Nigerian prince; Ricky starts to doubt his trip to Colombia; Darcey welcomes Jesse to America; Paul embarks on another journey to Brazil.

videos.title: Face to Face
videos.overview: Rachel's arrival in England doesn't go as planned. Angela must pause her Nigeria trip. Tarik ignores his brother's warnings. Paul finally reunites with Karine. Ricky's texts go unanswered in Colombia. Tension flares during Jesse's first day in America.

videos.title: Blindsided
videos.overview: Ricky's patience wears thin as he waits for Melissa. Jon adjusts to his new role as a dad. Michael welcomes Angela to Nigeria. Karine takes Paul's test. Tarik arrives in Manila and waits for a suspicious Hazel. Darcey prepares Jesse to meet her daughters.

videos.title: Family Ties
videos.overview: Michael introduces Angela to his Nigerian mom; tension follows Darcey and Jesse to Connecticut; Rachel meets Jon's skeptical sister; Paul and Karine butt heads; Tarik has quite the religious experience with Hazel's folks.

videos.title: Seeds of Doubt
videos.overview: Paul and Karine experience premarital problems; Jon's sketchy past worries Rachel; Ricky weighs his options; Hazel's motives are questioned by Tarik's brother; Angela gets annoyed with Michael; tensions continue to rise with Darcey and Jesse.

videos.title: Trust a Try
videos.overview: Darcey & Jesse reach a breaking point. Angela makes an unpleasant discovery. Jon defends his criminal past to Rachel's dad. Ricky has some questions for Ximena. Paul waits for Karine at the altar. Tarik tries to make things good with Hazel.

videos.title: Truth or Lie
videos.overview: Jesse's trip to America comes to an end. Karine and Paul continue to bicker. Single mom Marta plans a trip to Algeria. Rachel learns more about Jon's dating history. Angela's frustration with Michael boils over, and Ricky reveals all.

videos.title: Expecting the Unexpected
videos.overview: Ricky's news stuns Ximena. Hazel lets her guard down with Tarik. Michael pleads with Angela. Rachel & John receive tough news. Jesse plans another trip to see Darcey. Marta runs into immigration issues. Paul & Karine deal with shocking information.

videos.title: The Things We Do for Love
videos.overview: Rachel confronts Jon. Darcey gets emotional. Marta wonders if Daya will fulfill his promise? Paul & Karine face an unexpected event. Angela struggles to make a decision. Tarik weighs his options. Will Ricky take the plunge for love?

videos.title: Goodbye for Now
videos.overview: Jon and Rachel pick their wedding rings. Darcey and Jesse continue to fight while Paul comforts Karine. Marta makes a tough decision as Tarik prepares to leave Manila. Ximena gets a surprising message while Angela makes a shocking discovery.

videos.title: Tell All
videos.overview: The couples reunite for an emotional and riveting tell all special. Now that everyone is back to long distance, they face new pressures, tension, and challenges. Host Shaun Robinson gets to the bottom of where they stand now.

videos.title: Crazy in Love
videos.overview: Caesar plans to see his dream woman after years of talking online. Timothy is stuck in a love triangle. Rebecca keeps a secret from her Tunisian boyfriend. Avery prepares to meet a man who lives in a war zone. Darcey is back for another shot at love!

videos.title: Pack Your Bags
videos.overview: Avery hits a major roadblock on her way to Lebanon. Angela asks her daughter for a favor that would be life-changing. Caesar must convince Maria to go to Mexico. Darcey receives an interesting call and has Rebecca been 100% truthful with Zied?

videos.title: Little Lies
videos.overview: Angela deals with more issues surrounding Michael. Darcey gets ready to meet her new British man. Ben worries his Kenyan love interest isn't ready to become a stepmom. Avery finally meets her Syrian fiancé Omar. Rebecca digs into Zied's past.

videos.title: Love is a Battlefield
videos.overview: Tim & Jeniffer clash on day 1 in Colombia, Caesar heads to Mexico to meet Maria, Darcey gets emotional in London, Rebecca sees a different side to Zied in Tunisia, and Avery's mom causes friction at dinner when she expresses her skepticism of Omar.

videos.title: The Rest is Still Unwritten
videos.overview: Darcey confronts Tom about a certain issue. Ben must impress Akinyi's overprotective brother. Rebecca has concerns about Zied's temper after a dramatic night out, Avery and Omar discuss life in Syria. Caesar's plans to propose are up in the air.

videos.title: Secret, Secret, I've Got a Secret
videos.overview: Rebecca must impress Zied's parents, while Jeniffer is stunned to learn a secret about Tim's past. Ben meets Akinyi's family, and Darcey meets one of Tom's exes. Meanwhile, Angela & Michael get caught up in a brawl, and Caesar receives a shocking update.

videos.title: Under Pressure
videos.overview: Caesar suffers a devastating blow. Zied's sister gives Rebecca a hard time. Avery faces pressure the night before wedding. Tom is taken aback by Darcey's twin dynamic. Tim tries to fix things with Jeniffer and Ben is blamed for upsetting Akinyi.

videos.title: True Colors
videos.overview: Rebecca learns the results of Zied's background check. Avery delivers some devastating news to her mom. Benjamin finally meets Akinyi's father. Angela and Michael try to make amends. Darcey and Tom's relationship takes an interesting turn in Albania.

videos.title: Out of the Blue
videos.overview: Avery's mom deals with bad news. Benjamin sees a new side of Akinyi. Rebecca is alarmed by a request from Zied. Darcey becomes emotional during a night out in Albania. Angela and Michael look into fertility options in Nigeria. Caesar departs Mexico.

videos.title: Treat Me Right
videos.overview: Benjamin ponders his relationship ahead of the bride price ceremony. Angela confronts Michael's friends. Jeniffer and Tim question their compatibility. Avery and Omar spend their last day together in Beirut. Rebecca and Zied go to the Sahara Desert.

videos.title: Hard to Say I'm Sorry
videos.overview: Tim must make an important decision. Benjamin negotiates the bride price. Darcey confides in Tom's sister. Avery and Omar must say goodbye. Angela tries to make amends, and Rebecca reveals a bombshell.

videos.title: King of My Heart
videos.overview: Ben struggles through the bride price ceremony. Tim leaves Colombia with unfinished business. Rebecca tries to hold onto Zied. Caesar meets with a friend. Tom plans a big gesture for Darcey's last night. Angela is uneasy at her engagement party.

videos.title: Against All Odds
videos.overview: With the intense getting to know each other period ending, the couples must part ways. However, not all the couples handle the new distance well.

videos.title: Tell All Part 1
videos.overview: Host Shaun Robinson sits down with the cast for a deep dive into the details of their most intense moments from this drama-filled season.

videos.title: Tell All Part 2
videos.overview: Host Shaun Robinson dives back in to discuss more of the biggest moments with the couples and get an update on where their relationships stand now.

videos.title: Love Can't Wait
videos.overview: Ed, Avery, Geoffrey, Lisa, Stephanie, Yolanda and David are on a mission to meet their overseas soulmates in person for the very first time. Nothing can stop them from seeing if their dreams of love can become reality, and Darcey returns for some answers.

videos.title: Great Expectations
videos.overview: Darcey decodes mixed messages from Tom. Ed packs gifts for his queen. Yolanda has a confusing conversation with Williams. Geoffrey begins his journey to Russia. Avery seeks her parents approval, and Lisa's friends are concerned for her safety.

videos.title: Risky Business
videos.overview: Stephanie makes a life-changing decision. Lisa meets her Nigerian fiancé. Ed worries Rose won't feel a connection. Darcey makes a shocking discovery. Geoffrey's first day in Russia is off to a bumpy start. Yolanda has concerns about Williams.

videos.title: Baby Be Mine
videos.overview: Usman surprises Lisa. Darcey faces the truth. Avery & Ash finally meet. Stephanie risks her health to travel to Australia. David makes plans to go to Ukraine. Geoffrey questions Varya's intentions and Ed worries about Rose and her family's motives.

videos.title: Our Lips Are Sealed
videos.overview: Avery meets Ash's skeptical brother. Ed makes a shocking request. Geoffrey's biggest fear about Varya comes true. Lisa reaches a boiling point. Yolanda hopes she isn't making a mistake. David takes a leap of faith, and Stephanie & Erika finally meet!

videos.title: Can't Buy Me Love
videos.overview: Darcey and Tom prepare to meet face to face. Geoffrey questions Varya and the entire trip to Moscow. David anxiously awaits Lana. Stephanie and Erika get romantic. Ed faces regret, while Lisa faces Sojaboy's adoring fans at his music video premiere.

videos.title: Who's Crying Now
videos.overview: Darcey & Tom finally meet face to face. Yolanda investigates Williams. Ed meets Rosemarie's family. Stephanie & Erika get crafty. Varya's mother questions Geoffrey. Avery & Ash take a romantic getaway, while Lisa & Usman question their future.

videos.title: Stranger in a Strange Land
videos.overview: Usman asks for his mother's blessing. Varya shows Geoffrey her hometown. Ed spends the night at Rosemarie's. Ash & Avery tour the outback. David continues his quest for Lana. Stephanie travels to Erika's hometown, and Darcey & Tom process everything.

videos.title: Should've Known Better
videos.overview: Lisa & Usman plead their case to get married. Stephanie meets Erika's friends. Avery questions Ash's professional relationships. David prepares to meet Lana. Yolanda updates Karra on Williams. Geoffrey opens up to Varya's mom, and Darcey gets focused.

videos.title: Cuts Both Ways
videos.overview: Darcey has a surprise visitor. David doesn't give up on Lana. Ed confronts Rose about her sister. Avery attends Ash's seminar. Stephanie & Erika try to reconnect. Geoffrey & Varya go camping. Yolanda looks for answers and Lisa & Usman wait for a decision.

videos.title: Private Eyes
videos.overview: Lisa & Usman find common ground. Ed & Rosemarie enjoy some alone time. Stephanie meets Erika's parents. Avery & Ash clash. Yolanda's kids try to protect her. Geoffrey & Varya have a spa day. Darcey says goodbye, while David plans an investigation.

videos.title: King of Wishful Thinking
videos.overview: Avery spends some time with Ash's ex. Ed & Rose discuss their relationship. Erika opens up to Stephanie about her past. David listens to his heart, and Geoffrey & Varya look to the future.

videos.title: The Pleasure Principle
videos.overview: Geoffrey settles back home. Lisa confronts Usman. Ed leaves the Philippines. Avery & Ash spend time with his son. Darcey rethinks her priorities. Stephanie & Erika say goodbye. Yolanda wants answers from Williams, while David continues his quest for Lana.

videos.title: Hard Habit to Break
videos.overview: David tries to get closer to Lana. Avery says goodbye to Ash. Geoffrey finds himself caught in the middle of a sticky situation. Ed returns home. Stephanie reunites with her mom, and drama ensues when Lisa meets with Usman's elders.

videos.title: The Neverending Story
videos.overview: Stephanie reveals a secret. Geoffrey follows his heart. Darcey looks ahead to the future. David & Lana spend their last bit of time together. Ed hopes for a second chance, and Lisa & Usman must say goodbye.

videos.title: Tell All Part 1
videos.overview: Host Shaun Robinson sits down with the cast for a deep dive into the details of their most intense moments this season.

videos.title: Tell All Part 2
videos.overview: In Part 2 of the Tell All, host Shaun Robinson dives back in to discuss more of the biggest moments with our couples and updates on where their relationships stand now.

videos.title: A Leap of Faith
videos.overview: Gino packs for his trip to Panama to meet Jasmine. Memphis is ready to marry a Tunisian man she's never met before. Caleb and Alina prepare to meet after 13 years. Kim plans to fly across the world for her last shot at love -- with Usman.

videos.title: Catching Flights to Catch Feelings
videos.overview: Jasmine's jealousy rears its head. Memphis has a secret about her ex. Alina worries that Caleb doesn't understand her abilities. Usman's friends do not support his relationship with Kim. Mike's friends believe his girlfriend Ximena is using him.

videos.title: First Date, Second Thoughts
videos.overview: Ella longs to meet her Asian prince, Johnny, in person. Gino and Jasmine have a fiery first date. Kim hopes for some romance with Usman. Memphis arrives in Tunisia. Caleb and Alina finally meet. Mike arrives in Colombia, but Ximena may be a no-show.

videos.title: Ghosts From the Past
videos.overview: Caleb has a confrontation with Alina's best friend; Mike wishes to fulfil Ximena's dreams; Johnny makes plans to help Ella shed some weight; Gino and Jasmine feel satisfied after walking up; Memphis and Hamza are not able to share a bed.

videos.title: False Starts And False Promises
videos.overview: Gino worries that Jasmine is materialistic and has a bad temper; Memphis isn't pleased with Hamza's performance in the bedroom; Johnny's family worries about him going to the U.S.; Ximena tells Mike a big secret; Alina wants a commitment from Caleb.

videos.title: Burns and Betrayals
videos.overview: Alina ponders telling Caleb about her secret; Memphis feels betrayed by Hamza; Kim challenges Usman's management; Ximena's past disturbs Mike; Jasmine comes clean to Gino; Ben tells his family about his girlfriend Mahogany, 28 years his junior.

videos.title: Never Have I Ever
videos.overview: Jasmine leaves Gino home and parties with a stripper. Kim and Usman clash over sleeping arrangements. Memphis is angry at Hamza's immaturity. Mike's habits gross out Ximena. Ben gets bad news from Mahogany. Alina reveals something she's been hiding.

videos.title: Calm Before the Storm
videos.overview: Gino's ex contacts Jasmine with some shocking information. Ella has a plan to finally meet Johnny. Alina hopes Caleb can get over her secret. Mike is making changes for Ximena. Ben worries Mahogany might be standing him up.

videos.title: Bad Romance
videos.overview: Jasmine explodes over Gino's texts to his ex. Ben attempts to track down Mahogany. Memphis asks Hamza for a prenup. Mike contemplates popping the question to Ximena. Caleb and Alina may finally become exclusive.

videos.title: Time's Up
videos.overview: Hamza struggles to accept Memphis' past; Caleb takes a big step with Alina; Ella gives Johnny an ultimatum; Gino and Jasmine attempt to move forward; Ben tries to keep hope alive in Peru; Usman surprises Kim; Mike sees a change in Ximena.

videos.title: Back to Square One
videos.overview: Gino prepares to meet Jasmine's mother. Hamza worries about Memphis' relationship with her ex-husband. Ximena gives Mike an ultimatum. Kim and Usman's relationship takes an unexpected turn for the worst.

videos.title: Head Games
videos.overview: Kim and Usman's relationship is put to the test. Gino tries to win over Jasmine's mum. Hamza worries about Memphis' relationship with her ex-husband. Mike seeks help to understand Ximena's doubts.

videos.title: There's No Fear in Love
videos.overview: Gino's past mistakes come back to haunt him. Kim gives Usman an ultimatum. Mike's friend gives him some tough love regarding Ximena. Ella gets a final answer from Johnny.

videos.title: Disappearing Act
videos.overview: Jasmine makes a decision about her relationship with Gino; Memphis prepares for a tough conversation with Hamza; Usman takes matters into his own hands; Ben's confusion about Mahogany deepens; Mike and Ximena's relationship takes a turn.

videos.title: Cold and Calculated
videos.overview: Gino's attempt to ask Jasmine for a prenup does not go as planned; Kim and Usman say goodbye; Mike tries to work things out with Ximena; Ben confronts Mahogany; Memphis and Hamza prepare to say I do.

videos.title: Unfinished Business
videos.overview: Usman has second thoughts; Memphis and Hamza say goodbye; Ben pleads his case to Mahogany; Jasmine wishes things were different with Gino; Ximena wants Mike gone.

videos.title: Tell All Part 1
videos.overview: Shaun takes a deep dive with cast members into the details of their intense and personal moments.

videos.title: Tell All Part 2
videos.overview: The drama continues as Shaun Robinson and the cast delve even further into the most intense moments of the season.

videos.title: Moonstruck
videos.overview: Amanda finds love again after a tragic loss; Gino and Jasmine have issues to fix before her visa is approved; Riley suspects his girlfriend is lying; Tyray finds out shocking information about his online lover; David has no doubt Sheila is the one.

videos.title: Say Anything
videos.overview: Amanda and Razvan spend their first night together; Tyray isn't ready to give up on Carmella; after discovering questionable texts, Riley grows more suspicious of Violet; Gino and Jasmine reunite; David begins his journey to meet Sheila.

videos.title: Overboard
videos.overview: Razvan has a surprise for Amanda. Despite their different pasts, Meisha and Nicola believe God has brought them together. Gino and Jasmine's first night ends in tears. Tyray looks for answers. Riley begins his journey to Vietnam.

videos.title: Splash
videos.overview: After seven years, Meisha and Nicola finally meet; Christian and Cleo hope opposites attract; Razvan tests Amanda's jealousy; Gino suggests a prenup, and Jasmine explodes; Riley and Violet have their first date; David meets his honey babe, Sheila.

videos.title: Suspect
videos.overview: Tyray discovers shocking information about Carmella; Meisha asks to meet Nicola's family; David spends his first night with Sheila; Gino gets some tough love; Riley's friend warns him about Violet; Christian is off to see Cleo.

videos.title: Dangerous Liaisons
videos.overview: Gino questions Jasmine's fidelity; Riley catches Violet texting another man; Statler can't wait to meet her girlfriend, Dempsey; Cleo worries Christian is having second thoughts.

videos.title: Fatal Attraction
videos.overview: Gino confronts Jasmine about her secret relationship; Meisha and Nicola learn surprising things about each other on a night out; Tyray hires a private investigator; Riley puts Violet in the hot seat; Christian and Cleo have different ideas of fun.

videos.title: Misunderstood
videos.overview: Gino and Jasmine seek professional help. Amanda is shocked that Razvan wants kids. Statler and Dempsey spend the night together. Sheila feels threatened by David's interpreter. Violet walks out on Riley. Meisha worries she's been wrong about Nicola.

videos.title: The Big Chill
videos.overview: David and Sheila face an unexpected tragedy. Gino and Jasmine try to get back on track. Cleo worries her autism will affect her relationship. Riley and Violet refuse to speak. Dempsey learns something shocking about Statler.

videos.title: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
videos.overview: Things get kinky with Gino and Jasmine; Amanda thinks Razvan is using her; Statler reveals her intentions to Dempsey's dad; Tyray gets ready to meet the real Carmella; Meisha and Nicola try to work things out; Cleo's trust in Christian is shaken.

videos.title: St. Elmo's Fire
videos.overview: Amanda and Razvan visit Dracula's castle. Jasmine makes progress with Gino's family. Cleo confronts Christian about his lie. Tyray finally meets the woman in the photos. Statler tells Dempsey she loves her -- and asks to move in.

videos.title: Field of Dreams
videos.overview: Riley attempts to reconcile with Violet. Gino is ready for a baby. Cleo seeks guidance from the stars. Nicola struggles to come clean to his family. Statler tries to repair her fragile relationship with Dempsey. Sheila's son is wary of David.

videos.title: Modern Romance
videos.overview: Christian invites a stranger to Thanksgiving; Meisha suspects Nicola has a problem with her past; David has a surprise for Sheila; Gino and Jasmine's problems come to a head; Riley tells Violet he contacted a PI.

videos.title: Dirty Dancing
videos.overview: Nicola shows Meisha his sensual side. Cleo questions Christian's habit of befriending women. Amanda meets Razvan's parents. Statler surprises Dempsey with a stay at a castle. David and Sheila enjoy a romantic vacation. Jasmine tells Gino it's over.

videos.title: Every Time We Say Goodbye
videos.overview: With bonus scenes -- Razvan's mom shares her concerns about his relationship. Dempsey discovers Statler doesn't want kids. Violet stops Riley from saying the L-word. Jasmine takes Gino by surprise with one last request. David and Sheila share a sad goodbye. Cleo wonders if Christian wants to stay exclusive.

videos.title: One Crazy Summer
videos.overview: A major disagreement threatens Statler and Dempsey's relationship. Riley receives shocking news from Violet. Nicola proposes. Razvan is not sure his relationship with Amanda can be fixed. Cleo worries that Christian won't remain committed. Jasmine's visa interview goes awry.

videos.title: Tell All Part 1
videos.overview: First Look -- On the shocking first half of the Before the 90 Days Tell All, the couples prepare to rehash their deep-seated relationship issues. Featuring exclusive content, the cast has no choice but to relive their most jaw-dropping and cringeworthy moments.

videos.title: Tell All Part 2
videos.overview: We're back in the studio with host Shaun Robinson and the cast of Before the 90 Days for Part 2 of the explosive Tell All. This time, the cast digs deeper into some unrevealed drama, and they do not hold back on sharing their opinions.

videos.title: Great Expectation
videos.overview: Rayne sees a future with a blind man in Nigeria. Tigerlily plans to marry her fiancé on the first day they meet. Loren prepares to meet the ladyboy of his dreams. Brian is keeping some details about his tragic accident from Ingrid.

videos.title: A Tale of Two Cities
videos.overview: Rayne meets Chidi for the first time, and Brian puts Ingrid to the test

videos.title: Sound and the Fury
videos.overview: Rayne's temper flares at the market. Tigerlily and Adnan take a big step in their relationship. Veah plans to bring her ex to meet her new boyfriend. Ingrid is overwhelmed by Brian's physical needs. Loren puts a ticking clock on his relationship.

videos.title: Revelations
videos.overview: Tigerlily and Adnan prepare themselves for an upcoming party. Ingrid learns about Brian's past. Loren reveals his financial woes to Faith. Niles struggles to tell Matilda he wants to postpone the wedding. Sunny fears religion will come between him and Veah.

videos.title: Brave New World
videos.overview: Tigerlily's big day seems to be all about Adnan. Loren reveals something to Faith about his sex life that shocks her. Niles travels to Ghana. Brian hopes for a fresh start with Ingrid. Rayne and Chidi try to reconcile their different views.

videos.title: Paradise Lost
videos.overview: Tigerlily struggles with Adnan's rules. Rayne asks Chidi to come with her to a hotel. Niles and Matilda share a joyful first meet. Loren hopes it isn't over with Faith. Brian and Ingrid go to a resort. Sunny pulls out all the stops for Veah.

videos.title: Maybe in Another Life
videos.overview: Tigerlily and Adnan work through a big fight. Tensions between Rayne and Chidi's sister come to head. Niles buys Matilda a ring. Vanja is smitten with Božo despite past transgressions. Brian and Ingrid get physical. Loren promises to be faithful.

videos.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
videos.overview: Brian apologizes to Ingrid. Niles tells Matilda he wants to postpone the wedding. Sunny is shocked by whom Veah brought with her to South Africa. Vanja worries when she doesn't hear from Božo. Loren tries to get out of the friendzone. Tigerlily and Adnan have a tearful goodbye.

videos.title: Things Fall Apart
videos.overview: Vanja and Božo meet for the first time. Rayne and Chidi spend time apart. Tigerlily heads to Turkey to reunite with Adnan. Faith opens up about her childhood to Loren. Niles tries to diffuse a tense situation with Matilda. Brian meets Ingrid's mom.

videos.title: War & Peace
videos.overview: Niles comes clean to Matilda's family and hopes they will still accept him as her fiancé. Bozo makes a devastating confession. Veah opens up to Sunny about her feelings for Rory. Tigerlily and Adnan reunite in Turkey.

videos.title: The Fault in Our Stars
videos.overview: Tigerlily pushes Adnan to compromise. Rayne and Chidi reunite. Matilda sees Niles' autism affecting their relationship. Veah learns Sunny hasn't been totally honest with her. Newcomer Joe is certain Magda is the one, but his family isn't so sure.

videos.title: Catch 22
videos.overview: Sunny and Rory come face to face. On the morning of his flight to meet Magda, Joe is nowhere to be found. Brian and Ingrid travel to Recife. Vanja hopes meeting Božo's friends will give her some insight. Loren meets Faith's family.

videos.title: The Dark Is Rising
videos.overview: Magda interrogates Joe about his last sexcapade. Niles wonders if Matilda misled him. Loren proposes a plan to marry Faith's mom. Ingrid learns Brian has been married four times. Sunny gives Veah an ultimatum.

videos.title: A Separate Peace
videos.overview: Loren tries to win over Faith's friends. Niles makes a shocking decision. Tigerlily has a sobering realization. Vanja is surprised by an unexpected dinner guest. Joe learns that this isn't the first time Magda moved abroad for a boyfriend.

videos.title: The Call of the Wild
videos.overview: Brian makes big accusations against Ingrid. Sunny and Rory try to make peace. Magda accuses Joe of going back on his word. Niles calls his parents to tell them about the wedding. Loren is in hot water with Faith.

videos.title: The Razor's Edge
videos.overview: Brian and Ingrid share an emotional goodbye. Loren and Faith make some big decisions. Mr. Arc is Nile's last hope to make his wedding happen. Tigerlily tries to impress Adnan's family. Veah meets Sunny's father and Sunny's worst fears come true.

videos.title: The Choice
videos.overview: Vanja asks Bosko if they are official. Loren's behavior pushes Faith away, possibly for good. Joe tries to win over Magda's mom after learning she knows about his past. Sunny shocks Veah with an ultimatum.

videos.title: Before We Say Goodbye
videos.overview: Madga threatens to eat Joey's eyeballs after he reveals a secret. Loren tries to patch things up with Faith. Vanja and Josko share an emotional goodbye. Niles gets some interesting advice before his wedding. Sunny is stuck between religion and love.

videos.title: Never Let Me Go
videos.overview: Matilda and Niles share an emotional goodbye. Vanja reaches out to Josko and wants answers. Sunny's dad issues an ultimatum. Magda hopes for a proposal. Tigerlily shares troubling news about her relationship with Adnan.

videos.title: Tell All, Part 1
videos.overview: Tonight, we catch up with the couples of Before the 90 Days and learn where their relationships stand. It's one shocking moment after the next; as we find out who is broken up, who is back together and whose ex reached out with a shocking revelation.

videos.title: Tell All, Part 2
videos.overview: In part two of the ultimate Tell All event, we find out the truth about why Joey almost missed his flight. Veah and Adnan clash over religion, Brian drops a bombshell about Ingrid, and a heated Niles walks off. Later, a fight breaks out backstage.

videos.title: Tell All, Part 3
videos.overview: On part 3 of the Before the 90 Days Tell All, Veah comes under fire for her decision to bring Rory, Faith struggles to put a label on her and Loren's relationship, and Vanja reveals a shocking betrayal.

videos.title: Tell All, Part 4
videos.overview: On the epic conclusion to the Tell All, more secrets are uncovered. Loren breaks down in tears. Brian's girlfriend reveals concerns about lies and jealousy. Joey comes clean after some never before seen footage comes to light leaving everyone shocked.

videos.title: It's Going To Be A Bumpy Ride
